options.styles:
<style>
  table {
    font-size: 25px;
    max-width: 1950px;
    border-collapse: collapse;
  }

  th {
    font-size: 20px;
    font-weight: bold;
    text-align: left;
  }

  td {
    font-size: 25px;
    padding: 8px;
    height: 90px;
  }

  td.time {
    font-weight: bold;
    font-size: 20px;
    min-width: 200px;
  }

  th#engagement {
    width: 175px;
  }

  td.reach {
    width: 122px;
  }

  td.videoViews {
    width: 124px;
  }
  td.number{
    text-align: center;
  }
  td#type {
    width: 60px;
    text-align: center;
  }

  td#post {
    width: auto;
    word-wrap: break-word;
    white-space: normal;
}
</style>

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  -- time,
  FORMAT_TIMESTAMP('%d.%m | %H:%M Uhr', TIMESTAMP(time)) AS time,
  videoViews,
  reach,
  type AS Typ,
  -- REPLACE(message, 'ÔøΩ', '') AS Post, 
  CASE 
    WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(SPLIT(message, '\n')[SAFE_OFFSET(0)], 'ÔøΩ', '')) > 80 
    THEN CONCAT(LEFT(REPLACE(SPLIT(message, '\n')[SAFE_OFFSET(0)], 'ÔøΩ', ''), 80), '...')
    ELSE REPLACE(SPLIT(message, '\n')[SAFE_OFFSET(0)], 'ÔøΩ', '')
END AS Post,
  CASE
    WHEN type = 'Reel' THEN totalInteractions
    ELSE engagement
  END AS engagement,FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.instagramInsightsOwnPosts`
WHERE profileId = $profileID
AND (type = 'Video' OR type = 'Reel')
AND $Zeitraum 
AND last_update = 
  (SELECT MAX(last_update) 
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.instagramInsightsOwnPosts` 
  WHERE profileId = $profileID)
ORDER BY engagement DESC LIMIT 7
